AWSEBLoadBalancerURL.Description: The ElasticBeanstalk ELB URL of the website

LogPublicationControl.Description: If true customer service logs will be published to S3.

XRayEnabled.Description: Enables AWS X-Ray for your environment.

AppSource.Description: The url of the application source.

ProxyServer.Description: Specifies which proxy server to be used for client connections.

InstanceType.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid EC2 instance type.

Metadata.ForcingMetadataUpdate: Changing something in the metadata will force re-compuation
